alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Montgomery; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 4:25PM CST until December 29 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grenada County in north central Mississippi... Webster County in north central Mississippi... Northwestern Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 425 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Duck Hill, or near Winona, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sweatman around 435 PM CST. Lodi around 440 PM CST. Embry around 455 PM CST. Eupora and Bellefontaine around 500 PM CST. Clarkson around 510 PM CST. Cumberland around 515 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Walthall. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northeastern Mississippi.
